message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe will be very valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $140. This is a great price considering the product's worth to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you considering my budget.  I'm really interested, but I can't go above $130 right now. Would you be willing to consider that?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still a bit above your price point. I'm willing to come down to $135.  This is still a great deal for you, as it's well below the value you place on the product.  Let's see if we can make this work.
